details.title: Numerical simulation of spatially developed shear mixing layer of incompressible fluid flow
details.abstract: The spatially developed mixing layer of incompressible flow is simulated with compact high order accurate difference scheme. The open boundary condition and the numerical method in solving Poisson equation of pressure are described in detail. Two different examples are displayed. The results show that the disturbance at entry can be used to control the vortex structure in mixing layer.
